attributes.action: Stop all legal/illegal immigrants/immigration to the UK. Effective immediately
attributes.additional_details:
Create a law saying no immigration/migration/refugees to the UK. 
Give the UK Power to return all people found entering the country with out a British passport to be Immediately returned via boat/train. 
The money put into the refugee camps and immigration process can be used on travel fairs to send people back to the first safe country they arrived at before putting their self at risk attempting to cross the British channel. 
If people would like to come to the UK they can apply correctly.
attributes.background: Stop all immigration to the UK, we currently have a housing crisis with out adding more people, nhs crisis with out adding more people. We are putting our own people at risk trying to help others. We need to put a stop to all immigration with immediate effect.
